extendedInfo.description: Features:- Check status of your flight- Get Airport information and directions on the map- Book flights- No AdsThe Ultimate Flight Finder App is a lightweight and simple companion for when you travel by air. Use this app for finding budget fares and as a fast and reliable status tracker for your flight.With this app you can:- Check status of your flight to see if it's delayed, en-route, cancelled etc. Find out airport details and terminal of departure and arrival flight.- Book cheap flights using the excellent skyscanner service, which provides independent low rate fares from multiple online booking sites.- Find out airport information for any airport in the world along with directions from your current location using google maps.Flight and airport information is global, airlines included are Delta Airlines, United Airlines, Delta, American Airlines, Lufthansa, China Southern Airlines, Air France, Southwest Airlines, British Airlines, Aer Lingus, Ryan Air and many more...  Airport data extracted from countries including North America(USA), UK, Germany, Switzerland, Spain, Ireland, Australia and more.

reviews.title: Totally waste of time. Useless!
reviews.comment: I\'m currently waiting 20 minutes after the scheduled departure time This app reported that the flight is I time, as well as the wrong gate
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: i like it
